name: Mr. WongTong's Chinese Food Shop
description: In Mr. WongTong's Chinese Food Shop, you are a customer of Mr. WongTong and you order some food. But with Mr. WongTong's all-rice diet he becomes "a bit" on edge. Try to order your food without Mr. WongTong getting mad, or don't, I can't control you. Hint: You can give an answer that is not given, ie: Run? y/n Answer: Maybe.
